rooms.description: A welcoming space with Vastu-aligned entrance aligned to the east for positive energy flow.
A spacious combined living-dining area designed in Chettinad style with traditional motifs and vibrant color palette to accommodate family gatherings.
A dedicated workspace located near the entrance for easy access while ensuring a quiet environment. Windows placed on the north for concentration.
Functional kitchen with modern appliances integrated into a traditional Chettinad setting, with south-facing windows to maintain balance.
A well-placed ensuite bathroom for the living area ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu by avoiding direct alignment with the main entrance.

openings.description: Large enough for vehicular entry and aligned to Vastu principles.
Dedicated two-car garage door providing ample space for vehicles.
Discreet access to the home theater ensuring sound insulation and privacy.
